column3: News; Phnom Penh:  A Finnish man  was found dead at 7:00 am on December 3  at Guest House “No 10”
column13: checked in on the night of January 2
column15: with his wife and planned to continue to Kampong Cham on January 3.------ At 7:00 pm
column16: the victim’s wife was shocked because her husband had died. The owner of the hotel immediately reported to the local authorities to come and inspect the body at the scene.------Later
column17: Phnom Penh police and medical experts concluded the death was from a drug induced heart attack. Presently
column18: the body has been moved to Stung Meanchey pagoda. The victim’s belongings were  handed over to the Bureau of Investigation.------Warning: ------Graphic images of scene ------*It is believed that the victim lived in Kampong Cham and ran a homestay with his Khmer wife.
